code:
inner_product (ax,ay) (bx,by) = ax * bx + ay * by
vabs (ax,ay) = sqrt (ax*ax+ay*ay)
vmul a (ax,ay) = (a*ax,a*ay)
vadd (ax,ay) (bx,by) = (ax+bx,ay+by)
vsub (ax,ay) (bx,by) = (ax-bx,ay-by)

vatan (x,y) = atan2 y x
vnorm (x,y) = x*x+y*y

fmod m v
  | v > m = fmod m (v-m)
  | v < 0 = fmod m (v+m)
  | otherwise = v

judge a1 t1 a2 t2
  | a2 == 0  = "ON_SEGMENT"
  | da == 0  = if a2 > a1
               then "ONLINE_FRONT"
               else "ON_SEGMENT"
  | da == pi = "ONLINE_BACK"
  | da <  pi = "COUNTER_CLOCKWISE"
  | otherwise= "CLOCKWISE"
  where
    da = fmod (2*pi) (t2-t1)

ans p0 p1 p2 =
  let v1 = p1 `vsub` p0
      v2 = p2 `vsub` p0
      t1 = vatan v1
      t2 = vatan v2
      a1 = vnorm v1
      a2 = vnorm v2
  in
    judge a1 t1 a2 t2

main = do
  l <- getLine
  getLine
  qs' <- getContents
  let (p0x:p0y:p1x:p1y:_) = map read $ words l :: [Double]
      qs = map (map read) $ map words $ lines qs' :: [[Double]]
      o = map (\ (p2x:p2y:_) -> ans (p0x,p0y) (p1x,p1y) (p2x,p2y) ) qs
  mapM_ putStrLn o

import Control.Applicative ((<$>))
import Control.Monad
import Data.Complex

type Vector = Complex Double

eps :: Double
eps = 1e-7

dot :: Vector -> Vector -> Double
dot a b = realPart $ conjugate a * b

cross :: Vector -> Vector -> Double
cross a b = imagPart $ conjugate a * b

readWords :: Read a => IO [a]
readWords = map read . words <$> getLine

main :: IO ()
main = do
  [x1,y1,x2,y2] <- readWords :: IO [Double]
  let
    p0 = x1:+y1
    p1 = x2:+y2

  q <- readLn

  ps <- replicateM q $ do
    [x,y] <- readWords :: IO [Double]
    return $ x:+y

  forM_ ps $ \p2 -> do
    let sgn = (p1-p0)`cross`(p2-p0)

    when (sgn > eps) $ putStrLn "COUNTER_CLOCKWISE"
    when (sgn < -eps) $ putStrLn "CLOCKWISE"

    when (abs sgn < eps) $ do
      if (p1-p0)`dot`(p2-p0) < 0
        then putStrLn "ONLINE_BACK"
        else if magnitude (p2-p0) > magnitude (p1-p0)
          then putStrLn "ONLINE_FRONT"
          else putStrLn "ON_SEGMENT"

inner_product (ax,ay) (bx,by) = ax * bx + ay * by
vabs (ax,ay) = sqrt (ax*ax+ay*ay)
vmul a (ax,ay) = (a*ax,a*ay)
vadd (ax,ay) (bx,by) = (ax+bx,ay+by)
vsub (ax,ay) (bx,by) = (ax-bx,ay-by)

vatan (x,y) = atan2 y x
vnorm (x,y) = x*x+y*y

fmod m v
  | v > m = fmod m (v-m)
  | v < 0 = fmod m (v+m)
  | otherwise = v

judge a1 t1 a2 t2
  | da == 0  = if a2 > a1
               then "ONLINE_FRONT"
               else "ON_SEGMENT"
  | da == pi = "ONLINE_BACK"
  | da <  pi = "COUNTER_CLOCKWISE"
  | otherwise= "CLOCKWISE"
  where
    da = fmod (2*pi) (t2-t1)

ans p0 p1 p2 =
  let v1 = p1 `vsub` p0
      v2 = p2 `vsub` p0
      t1 = vatan v1
      t2 = vatan v2
      a1 = vnorm v1
      a2 = vnorm v2
  in
    judge a1 t1 a2 t2

main = do
  l <- getLine
  getLine
  qs' <- getContents
  let (p0x:p0y:p1x:p1y:_) = map read $ words l :: [Double]
      qs = map (map read) $ map words $ lines qs' :: [[Double]]
      o = map (\ (p2x:p2y:_) -> ans (p0x,p0y) (p1x,p1y) (p2x,p2y) ) qs
  mapM_ putStrLn o

inner_product (ax,ay) (bx,by) = ax * bx + ay * by
vabs (ax,ay) = sqrt (ax*ax+ay*ay)
vmul a (ax,ay) = (a*ax,a*ay)
vadd (ax,ay) (bx,by) = (ax+bx,ay+by)
vsub (ax,ay) (bx,by) = (ax-bx,ay-by)

vatan (x,y) = atan2 y x
vnorm (x,y) = x*x+y*y

judge a1 t1 a2 t2
  | t1 == t2    = if a2 > a1
                  then "ONLINE_FRONT"
                  else "ON_SEGMENT"
  | abs (t1-t2) == pi = "ONLINE_BACK"
  | t2 >  t1    = "COUNTER_CLOCKWISE"
  | otherwise   = "CLOCKWISE"

ans p0 p1 p2 =
  let v1 = p1 `vsub` p0
      v2 = p2 `vsub` p0
      t1 = vatan v1
      t2 = vatan v2
      a1 = vnorm v1
      a2 = vnorm v2
  in
    judge a1 t1 a2 t2

main = do
  l <- getLine
  getLine
  qs' <- getContents
  let (p0x:p0y:p1x:p1y:_) = map read $ words l :: [Double]
      qs = map (map read) $ map words $ lines qs' :: [[Double]]
      o = map (\ (p2x:p2y:_) -> ans (p0x,p0y) (p1x,p1y) (p2x,p2y) ) qs
  mapM_ putStrLn o

{-# LANGUAGE GeneralizedNewtypeDeriving #-}

import           Control.Applicative
import           Control.Monad
import qualified Data.ByteString.Char8 as B
import           Text.Printf

readi :: B.ByteString -> Int
readi b | Just (n, _) <- B.readInt b = n

--

newtype VDouble =
    VDouble Double
    deriving (Show, Read, Num, Floating, Fractional)

instance Eq VDouble where
    VDouble a == VDouble b = abs (a - b) < 1e-10

instance Ord VDouble where
    VDouble a `compare` VDouble b
        | VDouble a == VDouble b = EQ
        | a <  b                 = LT
        | otherwise              = GT

--

newtype V2 =
    V2 (VDouble, VDouble)
    deriving (Show)

(|+|) :: V2 -> V2 -> V2
V2 (a, b) |+| V2 (c, d) = V2 (a + c, b + d)

(|-|) :: V2 -> V2 -> V2
V2 (a, b) |-| V2 (c, d) = V2 (a - c, b - d)

(*|) :: VDouble -> V2 -> V2
k *| V2 (c, d) = V2 (k * c, k * d)

norm :: V2 -> VDouble
norm (V2 (a, b)) = a * a + b * b

abs' :: V2 -> VDouble
abs' = sqrt . norm

dot :: V2 -> V2 -> VDouble
V2 (a, b) `dot` V2 (c, d) = a * c + b * d

cross :: V2 -> V2 -> VDouble
V2 (a, b) `cross` V2 (c, d) = a * d - b * c

--

data Wise
    = COUNTER_CLOCKWISE
    | CLOCKWISE
    | ONLINE_BACK
    | ONLINE_FRONT
    | ON_SEGMENT
    deriving (Show)

ccw :: V2 -> V2 -> V2 -> Wise
ccw p0 p1 p2
    | cross a b > 0   = COUNTER_CLOCKWISE
    | cross a b < 0   = CLOCKWISE
    | dot a b < 0     = ONLINE_BACK
    | norm a < norm b = ONLINE_FRONT
    | otherwise       = ON_SEGMENT
  where
    a = p1 |-| p0
    b = p2 |-| p0

main :: IO ()
main = do
    [x0, y0, x1, y1] <- fmap (fromIntegral . readi) . B.words <$> B.getLine
    let p0 = V2 (x0, y0)
    let p1 = V2 (x1, y1)
    q <- readLn
    replicateM_ q $ do
        [a, b] <- fmap (fromIntegral . readi) . B.words <$> B.getLine
        let p2 = V2 (a, b)
        print $ ccw p0 p1 p2

x0, y0, x1, y1 = gets.chomp.split.map(&:to_f)
len1 = (x1 - x0) ** 2 + (y1 - y0) ** 2
 
gets.to_i.times{
    x2, y2 = gets.chomp.split.map(&:to_f)
    len2 = (x2 - x0) ** 2 + (y2 - y0) ** 2
    yonline = (y1 - y0) / (x1 - x0) * (x2 - x0) + y0 if x0 != x1
 
    arr = []
    if x0 < x1
        arr = [yonline, y2, (x1 - x0) * (x2 - x0)]
    elsif x0 > x1
        arr = [y2, yonline, (x1 - x0) * (x2 - x0)]
    else
        if y0 < y1
            arr = [x2, x0, (y1 - y0) * (y2 - y0)]
        else
            arr = [x0, x2, (y1 - y0) * (y2 - y0)]
        end
    end
 
    judge = ""
    if arr[0] < arr[1]
        judge = "COUNTER_CLOCKWISE"
    elsif arr[0] > arr[1]
        judge = "CLOCKWISE"
    else
        if arr[2] < 0
            judge = "ONLINE_BACK"
        else
            if len1 < len2
                judge = "ONLINE_FRONT"
            else
                judge = "ON_SEGMENT"
            end
        end
    end
    puts judge
}

x1, y1, x2, y2 = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
u = (x2 - x1) + (y2 - y1) * 1i
gets.to_i.times do
  x, y = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
  v = x - x1 + (y - y1) * 1i
  d, c = (u.conj * v).rect
  case
  when c > 0
    puts 'COUNTER_CLOCKWISE'
  when c < 0
    puts 'CLOCKWISE'
  when d < 0
    puts 'ONLINE_BACK'
  when d > (u.conj * u).real
    puts 'ONLINE_FRONT'
  else
    puts 'ON_SEGMENT'
  end
end

def projecter(x, y, xp, yp)
  return (xp * x + yp * y) / (x ** 2 + y ** 2), (yp * x - xp * y) / (x ** 2 + y ** 2)
end
def main(input = STDIN)
  x1, y1, x2, y2 = input.gets.split(" ").map(&:to_r)
  q = input.gets.to_i
  x, y = (x2 - x1), (y2 - y1)
  q.times do
    xp, yp = input.gets.split(" ").map(&:to_r)
    a, b = projecter(x, y, xp - x1, yp - y1)
    if b > 0
      puts "COUNTER_CLOCKWISE"
    elsif b < 0
      puts "CLOCKWISE"
    elsif a < 0
      puts "ONLINE_BACK"
    elsif a > 1
      puts "ONLINE_FRONT"
    else
      puts "ON_SEGMENT"
    end
  end
end
main

    len2 = (x2 - x0) ** 2 + (y2 - y0) ** 2
    yonline = Rational((y1 - y0) * (x2 - x0) + (x1 - x0) * y0, x1 - x0)

    arr = []
    if x0 < x1
        arr = [yonline, Rational(y2, 1), (x1 - x0) * (x2 - x0)]
    elsif x0 > x1
        arr = [Rational(y2, 1), yonline, (x1 - x0) * (x2 - x0)]
    else
        if y0 < y1
            arr = [x2, x0, (y1 - y0) * (y2 - y0)]
        else
            arr = [x0, x2, (y1 - y0) * (y2 - y0)]
        end
    end

    if arr[0] < arr[1]
        judge = "COUNTER_CLOCKWISE"
    elsif arr[0] > arr[1]
        judge = "CLOCKWISE"
    else
        if arr[2] < 0
            judge = "ONLINE_BACK"
        else
            if len1 < len2
                judge = "ONLINE_FRONT"
            else
                judge = "ON_SEGMENT"
            end
        end
    end
    puts judge
}

x1, y1, x2, y2 = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
u = (x2 - x1) + (y2 - y1) * 1i
gets.to_i.times do
  x, y = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
  v = x - x1 + (y - y1) * 1i
  d = (u.conj * v).imag
  case
  when d > 0
    puts 'COUNTER_CLOCKWISE'
  when d < 0
    puts 'CLOCKWISE'
  else
    d = (v / u).real
    case
    when d < 0
      puts 'ONLINE_BACK'
    when d <= 1
      puts 'ON_SEGMENT'
    else
      puts 'ONLINE_FRONT'
    end
  end
end

require 'matrix'

p0x, p0y, p1x, p1y = gets.split.map &:to_i
p0 = Vector[p0x, p0y]
p1 = Vector[p1x, p1y]

q = gets.to_i

def cross(p1, p2)
  return p1[0] * p2[1] - p1[1] * p2[0]
end

q.times do
  p2x, p2y = gets.split.map &:to_i
  p2 = Vector[p2x, p2y]
  if cross(p2-p1, p0-p1) > 0
    puts "COUNTER_CLOCKWISE"
  elsif cross(p2-p1, p0-p1) < 0
    puts "CLOCKWISE"
  elsif (p0-p1).inner_product(p2-p1) < 0
    puts "ONLINE_FRONT"
  elsif (p0-p1).norm >= (p2-p1).norm
    puts "ON_SEGMENT"
  else
    puts "ONLINE_BACK"
  end
end

class Point
  attr_accessor :x, :y
  def initialize(x, y)
    @x = x
    @y = y
  end

  def -(p)
    Point.new(x - p.x, y - p.y)
  end

  def norm
    @x * @x + @y * @y
  end
end

def dot(a, b)
  a.x * b.x + a.y * b.y
end

def cross(a, b)
  a.x * b.y - a.y * b.x
end

Segment = Struct.new('Segment', :p1, :p2)

def is_orthogonal?(s1, s2)
  dot(s1.p2 - s1.p1, s2.p2 - s2.p1).zero?
end

def is_parallel?(s1, s2)
  cross(s1.p2 - s1.p1, s2.p2 - s2.p1).zero?
end

def ccw(p0, p1, p2)
  a = p1 - p0
  b = p2 - p0
  return "COUNTER_CLOCKWISE" if cross(a, b) > 0
  return "CLOCKWISE" if cross(a, b) < 0
  return "ONLINE_BACK" if dot(a, b) < 0
  return "ONLINE_FRONT" if a.norm < b.norm
  return "ON_SEGMENT"
end

u = (x2 - x1) + (y2 - y1) * 1i
gets.to_i.times do
  x, y = gets.split.map(&:to_i)

  d = (u.conj * v).imag

x0, y0, x1, y1 = gets.split.map(&:to_f)

v0x = x1 - x0
v0y = y1 - y0
r0 = v0x*v0x+v0y*v0y
q = gets.to_i
q.times{
  x, y = gets.split.map(&:to_f)
  v1x = x - x0
  v1y = y - y0
  r1 = v1x*v1x+v1y*v1y
  cross_product = v0x * v1y - v0y * v1x
  if cross_product > 0
    puts "COUNTER_CLOCKWISE"
  elsif cross_product < 0
    puts "CLOCKWISE"
  else
    if v0x * v1x < 0 || v0y * v1y < 0
      puts "ONLINE_BACK"
    else
      if r0 < r1
        puts "ONLINE_FRONT"
      else
        puts "ON_SEGMENT"
      end
    end
  end
}

require 'complex'

# Complex * Complex -> Double                                                          

def dot(c1, c2)
  (c1.conj * c2).real
end

# Complex * Complex -> Double                                                          
def cross(c1, c2)
  (c1.conj * c2).imag
end

# Complex * Complex * Complex -> Complex                                               
# return the proj of vector p0p to vector p0p1                                         
def proj(p0, p1, p)
  (p1 - p0) * dot(p1 - p0, p - p0) / ((p1 - p0).abs ** 2) + p0
end


def sign d
  eps = 1e-8
  d < -eps ? -1 : (d > eps ? 1 : 0)
end

# Complex * Complex * Complex -> Bool                                                  
# Return true if Point q is on segment p1p2                                            
# otherwise return false                                                               
def on_seg(p1, p2, q)
  sign(cross(p1 - q, p2 - q)) == 0 &&
    sign(dot(p1 - q, p2 - q)) < 0
end

def direct(p0, p1, p2)
  d = cross(p1 - p0, p2 - p0)
  if sign(d) == 1
    :COUNTER_CLOCKWISE
  elsif sign(d) == -1
    :CLOCKWISE
  else
    if on_seg(p2, p1, p0)
      :ONLINE_BACK
    elsif on_seg(p0, p2, p1)
      :ONLINE_FRONT
    else
      :ON_SEGMENT
    end
  end  
end

def main
  xp0, yp0, xp1, yp1 = gets.chomp.split(/\s/).collect { |x| x.to_f}
  q = gets.chomp.to_i
  (1..q).each do |ca|
    p0 = Complex(xp0, yp0)
    p1 = Complex(xp1, yp1)
    x, y = gets.chomp.split(/\s/).collect { |x| x.to_f}
    p = Complex(x, y)
    puts direct(p0, p1, p).to_s
  end
end

main

module Point = struct

  type t = { x : float; y : float }

  let make x y = { x; y }

  let equal a b = abs_float (a.x -. b.x) < 1e-10 && abs_float (a.y -. b.y) < 1e-10

  let sum a b = { x = a.x +. b.x; y = a.y +. b.y }

  let diff a b = { x = a.x -. b.x; y = a.y -. b.y }

  let multi p k = { x = p.x *. k; y = p.y *. k }

  let div p k = { x = p.x /. k; y = p.y /. k }

  let norm p = p.x *. p.x +. p.y *. p.y

  let abs p = norm p |> sqrt

  let dot a b = a.x *. b.x +. a.y *. b.y

  let cross a b = a.x *. b.y -. a.y *. b.x

  let project p1 p2 p =
    let base = diff p2 p1 in
    dot (diff p p1) base /. norm base
    |> multi base
    |> sum p1

  let reflect p1 p2 p =
    multi (diff (project p1 p2 p) p) 2.
    |> sum p

end

open Point

let eps = 1e-10

let ccw p0 p1 p2 =
  let a = diff p1 p0 in
  let b = diff p2 p0 in
  let c = cross a b in
  if c > eps then "COUNTER_CLOCKWISE"
  else if c < (-. eps) then "CLOCKWISE"
  else if dot a b < (-. eps) then "ONLINE_BACK"
  else if norm a < norm b then "ONLINE_FRONT"
  else "ON_SEGMENT"

let () =
  let x0, y0, x1, y1 = Scanf.scanf "%f %f %f %f " (fun a b c d -> a,b,c,d) in
  let p0 = make x0 y0 in
  let p1 = make x1 y1 in
  let q = Scanf.scanf "%d " (fun i -> i) in
  for _ = 0 to q - 1 do
    let x, y = Scanf.scanf "%f %f " (fun x y -> x,y) in
    make x y |> ccw p0 p1 |> print_endline
  done

let () =
  let cross (x0,y0) (x1,y1) = x0*.y1-.x1*.y0 and
      inner (x0,y0) (x1,y1) = x0*.x1+.y0*.y1 and
      norm (x,y) = x*.x+.y*.y
  in
  let (px0,py0,px1,py1) = Scanf.scanf " %f %f %f %f" (fun w x y z -> (w,x,y,z)) and
      n = read_int () in
  let v0 = (px1-.px0, py1-.py0) in
  let rec read = function
      0 -> ()
    | i ->
       let (px2,py2) = Scanf.scanf " %f %f" (fun x y -> (x,y)) in
       let v1 = (px2-.px0, py2-.py0) in
       if cross v0 v1 > (1e-10) then print_endline "COUNTER_CLOCKWISE"
       else if cross v0 v1 < -.(1e-10) then print_endline "CLOCKWISE"
       else if inner v0 v1 < -.(1e-10) then print_endline "ONLINE_BACK"
       else if norm v0 < norm v1 then print_endline "ONLINE_FRONT"
       else print_endline "ON_SEGMENT";
       read (i-1)
  in read n
;;

  in
  let (px0,py0,px1,py1) = Scanf.scanf " %f %f %f %f\n" (fun w x y z -> (w,x,y,z)) and

       else if inner v0 v1 < -.(1e-10) then print_endline "ONLINE_BACK"
       else if norm v0 < norm v1 then print_endline "ONLINE_FRONT"
       else print_endline "ON_SEGMENT";
       read (i-1)
  in read n

module Point = struct

  type t = { x : float; y : float }

  let make x y = { x; y }

  let equal a b = abs_float (a.x -. b.x) < 1e-10 && abs_float (a.y -. b.y) < 1e-10

  let sum a b = { x = a.x +. b.x; y = a.y +. b.y }

  let diff a b = { x = a.x -. b.x; y = a.y -. b.y }

  let multi p k = { x = p.x *. k; y = p.y *. k }

  let div p k = { x = p.x /. k; y = p.y /. k }

  let norm p = p.x *. p.x +. p.y *. p.y

  let abs p = norm p |> sqrt

  let dot a b = a.x *. b.x +. a.y *. b.y

  let cross a b = a.x *. b.y -. a.y *. b.x

  let project p1 p2 p =
    let base = diff p2 p1 in
    dot (diff p p1) base /. norm base
    |> multi base
    |> sum p1

  let reflect p1 p2 p =
    multi (diff (project p1 p2 p) p) 2.
    |> sum p

end

open Point

let eps = 1e-10

let ccw p1 p2 p =
  let a = diff p1 p in
  let b = diff p2 p in
  let c = cross a b in
  if c > eps then "COUNTER_CLOCKWISE"
  else if c < (-. eps) then "CLOCKWISE"
  else if dot a b < (-. eps) then "ONLINE_BACK"
  else if norm a < norm b then "ONLINE_FRONT"
  else "ON_SEGMENT"

let () =
  let x1, y1, x2, y2 = Scanf.scanf "%f %f %f %f " (fun a b c d -> a,b,c,d) in
  let p1 = make x1 y1 in
  let p2 = make x2 y2 in
  let q = Scanf.scanf "%d " (fun i -> i) in
  for _ = 0 to q - 1 do
    let x, y = Scanf.scanf "%f %f " (fun x y -> x,y) in
    make x y |> ccw p1 p2 |> print_endline
  done

       else if norm v0 < norm v1 then print_endline "ONLINE_FRONT"
       else print_endline "ON_SEGMENT";
       read (i-1)
  in read n

def cross(a,b):
    crs = a[0]*b[1] - a[1]*b[0]
    return crs
def dot(a,b):
    dt = a[0]*b[0] + a[1]*b[1]
    return dt
eps = 0.000001

    v2=[p2[0]-p0[0],p2[1]-p0[1]]
    if cross(v1,v2) >eps:
        print("COUNTER_CLOCKWISE")
    elif cross(v1,v2) <-eps:
        print("CLOCKWISE")
    elif dot(v1,v2)<-eps:
        print("ONLINE_BACK")
    elif v1[0]**2+v1[1]**2 < v2[0]**2+v2[1]**2:#abs(v1[0])<abs(v2[0]):はx成分0でおかしい
        print("ONLINE_FRONT")
    else:#p1=p2はこっち
        print("ON_SEGMENT")

import math

eps = 10 ** -8

line = input()
x1, y1, x2, y2 = list(map(int, line.split()))
line = input()
q = int(line)
pts = []
for _ in range(0, q):
    line = input()
    x, y = list(map(int, line.split()))
    pts += [[x, y]]

def solve():
    l1 = math.sqrt((x1 - x2)**2 + (y1 - y2)**2)
    for x, y in pts:
        l2 = math.sqrt((x - x1)**2 + (y - y1)**2)
        dx = (x2 - x1) / l1
        dy = (y2 - y1) / l1
        ip = (x - x1) * (x2 - x1) + (y - y1) * (y2 - y1)
        sine = (x - x1) * (y2 - y1) - (y - y1) * (x2 - x1)
        if sine < 0.0:
            print("COUNTER_CLOCKWISE")
        elif sine > 0.0:
            print("CLOCKWISE")
        elif abs(ip - l1 * l2) < eps:
            if l1 < l2:
                print("ONLINE_FRONT")
            else:
                print("ON_SEGMENT")
        elif ip + l1 * l2 < eps:
            print("ONLINE_BACK")
solve()

#!/usr/bin/env python
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

"""
input:
0 0 2 0
3
-1 0
0 0
3 0

output:
ONLINE_BACK
ON_SEGMENT
ONLINE_FRONT
"""

import sys

EPS = 1e-9


def cross(a, b):
    return a.real * b.imag - a.imag * b.real


def dot(a, b):
    return a.real * b.real + a.imag * b.imag


def calc_distance(p_info):
    for point in p_info:
        p2_real, p2_imag = map(int, point)
        p2 = p2_real + p2_imag * 1j
        a, b = p1 - p0, p2 - p0
        if cross(a, b) > EPS:
            print('COUNTER_CLOCKWISE')
        elif cross(a, b) < -1 * EPS:
            print('CLOCKWISE')
        elif dot(a, b) < -1 * EPS:
            print('ONLINE_BACK')
        elif abs(a) < abs(b):
            print('ONLINE_FRONT')
        else:
            print('ON_SEGMENT')
    return None


if __name__ == '__main__':
    _input = sys.stdin.readlines()
    base_line = tuple(map(int, _input[0].split()))
    p0, p1 = (x + y * 1j for x, y in zip(base_line[::2], base_line[1::2]))

    q_num = int(_input[1])
    q_list = map(lambda x: x.split(), _input[2:])
    calc_distance(q_list)

#  http://judge.u-aizu.ac.jp/onlinejudge/description.jsp?id=CGL_1_C&lang=jp
#  Counter-Clockwise : python3
#  2018.12.11 yonezawa

#from collections import deque
import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline
#import cProfile
from math import cos,sin,radians,sqrt

def crossProduct(s1,s2,s3):
    (x1,y1) = s1
    (x2,y2) = s2
    (x3,y3) = s3
    x1 = x1 - x2
    y1 = y1 - y2
    x3 = x3 - x2
    y3 = y3 - y2
    d = x1 * y3 - y1 * x3
    return d
def distance(s1,s2):
    (x1,y1) = s1
    (x2,y2) = s2
    return sqrt(pow((x1-x2),2) + pow((y1-y2),2))

    

    

def main():
    (x1,y1,x2,y2) = map(int,input().split())
    for i in range(int(input())):
        (x3,y3) = map(int,input().split())
        n = crossProduct((x1,y1),(x2,y2),(x3,y3))
        if n == 0:
            d1 = distance((x1,y1),(x2,y2))
            d2 = distance((x1,y1),(x3,y3))
            d3 = distance((x2,y2),(x3,y3))
            #print (d1,d2,d3,"p1:",x1,y1,"p2:",x2,y2,"p3:",x3,y3)
            #print (round(d1+d2,10),round(d3,10))
            if round(d1 + d2,5) == round(d3,5) and d1 != 0 and d2 != 0:
                print ("ONLINE_BACK")
            elif d1 >= d2 :
                print ("ON_SEGMENT")
            else:
                print ("ONLINE_FRONT")
        elif n > 0:
            print ("CLOCKWISE") 
        elif n < 0:
            print ("COUNTER_CLOCKWISE")


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
    #pr = cProfile.Profile()
    #pr.runcall(main)
    #pr.print_stats()

# https://onlinejudge.u-aizu.ac.jp/courses/library/4/CGL/all/CGL_1_C
# この問題は後の交差判定のところで使う
from math import sqrt


class Vector:
    def __init__(self, ls):
        '''
        ls ... list
        '''
        self.vec = ls

    def __len__(self):
        return len(self.vec)

    def __getitem__(self, idx):
        return self.vec[idx]

    def __repr__(self):
        return f'Vector({self.vec})'

    def add(self, vec):
        '''
        vec ... vector class
        '''
        assert len(self) == len(vec)
        ret = [a + b for a, b in zip(self.vec, vec.vec)]
        return Vector(ret)

    def sub(self, vec):
        '''
        vec ... vector class
        '''
        assert len(self) == len(vec)
        ret = [a - b for a, b in zip(self.vec, vec.vec)]
        return Vector(ret)

    def mul(self, vec):
        '''
        vec ... vector class
        '''
        assert len(self) == len(vec)
        ret = [a * b for a, b in zip(self.vec, vec.vec)]
        return Vector(ret)

    def norm(self):
        tmp = sum([x * x for x in self.vec])
        return sqrt(tmp)


def norm(vec):
    '''
    vec ... Vector class
    '''
    return vec.norm()


def cross(a, b):
    '''
    Outer product for 2d
    a,b ... Vector class
    '''
    assert len(a) == 2 and len(b) == 2
    first = a[0] * b[1]
    second = a[1] * b[0]
    return first - second


def dot(a, b):
    return sum(a.mul(b))


EPS = 1e-10


def ccw(p0, p1, p2):
    '''
    問題を解くための関数
    引数はすべてVector
    '''
    a = p1.sub(p0)
    b = p2.sub(p0)
    if cross(a, b) > EPS:
        return 'COUNTER_CLOCKWISE'
    elif cross(a, b) < -EPS:
        return 'CLOCKWISE'
    elif dot(a, b) < 0:  # 同一直線状でa,bが逆を向いている
        return 'ONLINE_BACK'
    elif a.norm() < b.norm():  # a,bが同じ方向を向いて かつ bがaよりも長い
        return 'ONLINE_FRONT'
    else:
        return 'ON_SEGMENT'


# load data
x0, y0, x1, y1 = list(map(int, input().split()))
N = int(input())
p0 = Vector([x0, y0])
p1 = Vector([x1, y1])
for _ in range(N):
    x2, y2 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p2 = Vector([x2, y2])
    print(ccw(p0, p1, p2))

def dot(a,b):return a[0]*b[0] + a[1]*b[1]
def cross(a,b):return a[0]*b[1] - a[1]*b[0]
def Order(a,b):
    crs = cross(a,b)
    if crs > 0 : return "COUNTER_CLOCKWISE"
    elif crs < 0 : return "CLOCKWISE"
    else:
        if dot(a,b) < 0 : return "ONLINE_BACK"
        elif dot(a,a) < dot(b,b) : return "ONLINE_FRONT"
        else : return "ON_SEGMENT"

x0,y0,x1,y1 = [int(i) for i in input().split()] 
a = [x1-x0,y1-y0]

q = int(input())
for i in range(q):
    x2,y2 = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    b = [x2-x0,y2-y0]
    print(Order(a,b))
